channel.title: Lifestyle on Portfolio website of Martino Armanini
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Portfolio website of Martino Armanini

item.title: Car Manufacturers in the NYSE
item.description: Returns of financial automotive stocks In this little reasearch, Lorenzo, an Italian patriot, has asked us to analyse the financial performances of the automotive companies in the NYSE. He firmly beleieves that “the italians are better” and, thus will be more attractive to the stock market. Thanks to this curiosity we will dive into the financial markets, we will search for the Automotive companies’ stocks and compare them with a Risk and Return graph.

item.title: Getting to know your delays
item.description: Getting up in the air Flying is one of the comforts that we have all lost in the first months of 2020. It is for this reason that I have started looking into the cracks of the industry as soon as I had the chance and ability to manipulate data with R. I might have felt that doing this analysis would bring me closer to the feeling of freedom that I would have when taking a flight to another continent of country.
